overview:
Founder and Executiver Director of Infobase, a Top 50 sistem integrator according to the Informática Hoje directory and of Netpartner , now known as IInterativa, listed by Webdesign magazine as one of the greatest digital agencies in the country. Author of the books “UML Aplicada – da teoria à implementação” and “Estratégia Digital – vantagens competitivas na internet”, that was four months on the website Submarino bestseller list for internet books. Master in Management, holds two MBAs degrees. One in Marketing and other in General Management from Ibmec-RJ. Holds the Executive Certificate in Strategy and Innovation from the MIT Sloan School of Management and the Executive Certificate from the Program of Negotiation at Harvard Law School.

UML Aplicada: Research shows that large software projects have a huge probability of failure - it is more likely that an application will not be great with all your requirements on time and on budget in which this will happen. If you are working in one of these projects, you need to do anything to increase their chances of success, and modeling in UML is the only way to visualize your project and verify it against the requirements before your team coding. In this book you will find - History, development and evolution of UML; artifacts detailing the static and dynamic of UML; implementation of diagrams, statements of applicability, from projects’ supporting documentation until project code generation (. NET and Java) for managers - assembling work teams for OO projects, cases’ study with the best practices, trends - MDA (Model Driven Architeture).

Estratégia Digital (Digital Strategy): The book explores a highly debated topic and poorly documented, especially Brazilians cases studies: business models on the Internet. Dotcom companies or coming from the so-called “real world” have been hampered in their strategies sometimes for trying to reproduce exactly the models that were successful on land, sometimes for having comparative strangers. Approaching the main forms of business, since the models between businesses and consumers (B2C), business goes through each other (B2B) and others less famous, but promising, as P2P and C2C. Besides these points, issues of usability, online marketing, web writing, revenue strategies are analyzed. To illustrate the examples and studies addressed two cases are presented and produced with Webb Shoptime.com, national references in their business environments.”
